  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    This abstract class defines the properties of a ball Refactored by:
    Brick
    This abstract class specifies the properties that all brick types should have
    BrickCrack
    This class specifies the properties of a brick's crack Refactored by:
    CementBrick
    This class specifies the properties of the brown cement brick seen in the gameplay Refactored by:
    ClayBrick
    This class specifies the properties of the gray clay brick seen in the gameplay Refactored by:
    DebugConsole
    This method runs the Debug Console by pressing on 'Ctrl'+'alt'+'F1"
    GameFrame
    This class specifies the layout of the Game GUI Refactored by:
    GameplayScreen
    This class specifies the main flow and instructions needed in the game This class renders the animations and display of the components in the gameplay Refactored by:
    HomeMenu
    This class specifies the properties of the Home Menu, activated upon running, and "exit" from the pause menu Refactored by:
    Image
    This abstract class is created to handle passing in the Image in this directory to the HomeMenu Created by:
    InstructionImage
    This abstract class allows the instruction page to display an image Refactored by:
    InstructionPage
    This class defines the properties in the instruction page Refactored by:
    Main
    This class is the main class that executes the software Refactored by:
    Player
    This class specifies the properties of the Player, the green bar, that appears when the game starts Rfactored by:
    RenderDebugConsole
    This class defines the style and layout of the debug console Refactored by:
    RubberBall
    This class specifies the properties of the rubber ball based on the abstract class of Ball Refactored by:
    SteelBrick
    This class specifies the properties of the steel brick seen in the gameplay Refactored by:
    Wall
    This class specifies the properties of the wall, that activates when the game is played.
